remarks: If A is not ahead throughout, there is a ` k ` where votes are tied. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2016.)
statement:
ballotth.m $e |- M e. NN $.
ballotth.n $e |- N e. NN $.
ballotth.o $e |- O = { c e. ~P ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) | ( # ` c ) = M } $.
ballotth.p $e |- P = ( x e. ~P O |-> ( ( # ` x ) / ( # ` O ) ) ) $.
ballotth.f $e |- F = ( c e. O |-> ( i e. ZZ |-> ( ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) i^i c ) ) - ( # ` ( ( 1 ... i ) \ c ) ) ) ) ) $.
ballotth.e $e |- E = { c e. O | A. i e. ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) 0 < ( ( F ` c ) ` i ) } $.
ballotth.mgtn $e |- N < M $.
ballotlem5 $p |- ( C e. ( O \ E ) -> E. k e. ( 1 ... ( M + N ) ) ( ( F ` C ) ` k ) = 0 ) $.
$d C i k $.
$d E i k $.
